pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple content management system for Django 1.8+================================================``django-pages-cms`` is a simple content management system for Django 1.8+.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/dlancer/django-pages-cms.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/dlancer/django-pages-cms/ :alt: Build status.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-pages-cms.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-pages-cms/ :alt: Latest PyPI version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/django-pages-cms.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-pages-cms/ :alt: Number of PyPI downloads.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/format/django-pages-cms.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-pages-cms/ :alt: Download format.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/django-pages-cms.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-pages-cms/ :alt: LicenseRequirements------------:: Django>=1.8,<1.10 django-appcore>=0.0.9 django-mptt>=0.8.6 django-guardian>=1.4.6 django-markitup>=2.3.1 python-slugify>=1.2.1 PyYAML>=3.12 Markdown>=2.6.7Usage=====You can find detailed documentation in the "docs" directory.
